mapper.sql: SELECT KEYWORD_NO, TREE_NO, COPY_NO, KEYWORD, COLLAPSE, PARENT_KEYWORD_NO, COLOR FROM KEYWORDS
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, tv.* FROM ( SELECT k.* FROM trees t, keywords k, contents c WHERE t.tree_No = k.tree_No AND k.keyword_no = c.keyword_no AND (t.user_no = #{value} OR t.user_no IN(SELECT user_no2 FROM friends WHERE user_no = #{value})) ORDER BY c.reg_date DESC )tv)tv2 WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 7

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT color, copy_no, keyword, keyword_no, parent_keyword_no, tree_no FROM keywords WHERE tree_no in(SELECT tree_no FROM trees WHERE user_no = 1000023) ORDER BY keyword_no DESC) a ) b WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 and 10
SELECT u.user_no FROM users u, trees t, keywords k WHERE u.user_no = t.user_no and t.tree_no = k.tree_no and k.keyword_no = #{value}
